name: pickup
short_effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items. May also pick up an item after battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon used during a battle. It may pick up items outside of battle, too.
